content.rendered:
Directed by Paul Cameron. Anthony Byrne.

Written by Jill Wagner.

Cast Carla Mansour (Malika). Adam Budron (Sami). Scott Vogel (Hospital Patient). Scot Teller (Cruise). Daniel Abeles (Cpt. Jack Hansmuth). Scott Swope (Bouncer). Dan Matteucci (Fireman). Fawad Siddiqui (Security Chief Albutairi). Jordyn Rax (Kamal’s Girl). Ray Corasani (Ehsan). Avi Vichner (Security agent). Essam Ferris (Alashka). Zoe Saldana (Joe). James Jordan. LaMonica Garrett. Dave Annable. Marisol Correa (SA SWAT Shooter #1). Laysla De Oliveira (Cruz Manuelos). Martin Donovan (Errol Meade). Stephanie Nur (Aaliyah Amrohi). Zach Appelman (Lt. Jennings). Austin HÃ©bert (Randy). Hannah Love Lanier (Kate). Bassem Youssef (Amrohi). Matt Gulbranson (Patient). Tim R. Worley (Surgeon Asstistant). Scottie DiGiacomo (Patient). Gabe Bowling (Police Officer). Anthony Gullotta (Secret Service). Ethan Jones Romero (Edgar). Brian Foreman (Congressman). Jonah Wharton (Tex). Maggie Parto (Faiha). Noga Blum (Nurse). Erick Betancourt (Hernandez). Brenda Dettrey (Nurse). Celestina Harris (Charlie).

Language English.

Producers Michael Friedman. Khadija Alami. Michael J. Malone. Stefano Spadoni. Jill Wagner. Ron Burkle. David Glasser. David Hutkin. Nicole Kidman. Geyer Kosinski. Zoe Saldana. Taylor Sheridan. Bob Yari. David Hutkin.

Production 101 Studios. Blossom Films. MTV Entertainment Studios.

Creators Taylor Sheridan. Jill Wagner(co-creator).

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 8

Status On Going (2023–)
